description: Mobile techniques used by Xbot, ATT&CK software S0298 (v1.0)
name: Xbot (S0298)

techniques.comment: [Xbot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0298) can encrypt the victim's files in external storage (e.g., SD card) and then request a PayPal cash card as ransom.(Citation: PaloAlto-Xbot)
[Xbot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0298) can remotely lock infected Android devices and ask for a ransom.(Citation: PaloAlto-Xbot)
[Xbot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0298) uses phishing pages mimicking Google Play's payment interface as well as bank login pages.(Citation: PaloAlto-Xbot)
[Xbot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0298) steals all SMS message and contact information as well as intercepts and parses certain SMS messages.(Citation: PaloAlto-Xbot)
